<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that ppc&#95;altivec&#95;vperm has a big-endian bias, so when creating</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a vectorshuffle for little endian, we must undo the transformation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// performed on vec&#95;perm in altivec.h.  That is, we must complement</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the permutation mask with respect to 31 and reverse the order of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// V1 and V2.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;Mask = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>.getArgOperand(2))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(Mask-&gt;getAggregateElement(i))-&gt;getZExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">          Idx &amp;= 31; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Match the hardware behavior.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>.isLittleEndian())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ExtractedElts&#91;Idx&#93;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;getIntrinsicID() == Intrinsic::set&#95;loop&#95;iterations ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;getIntrinsicID() == Intrinsic::loop&#95;decrement)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock&#42;, 4&gt;</a> ExitingBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">  L-&gt;getExitingBlocks(ExitingBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there is an exit edge known to be frequently taken,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we should not transform this loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;BB : ExitingBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;TI = BB-&gt;getTerminator();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!TI) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(TI)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t TrueWeight = 0, FalseWeight = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!BI-&gt;isConditional() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">          !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac19cbbc4935a23e1d44f65e1eaba6b1d">extractBranchWeights</a>(&#42;BI, TrueWeight, FalseWeight))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the exit path is more frequent than the loop path,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we return here without further analysis for this loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TrueIsExit = !L-&gt;contains(BI-&gt;getSuccessor(0));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (( TrueIsExit &amp;&amp; FalseWeight &lt; TrueWeight) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">          (!TrueIsExit &amp;&amp; FalseWeight &gt; TrueWeight))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Returns a cost adjustment factor to adjust the cost of vector instructions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// on targets which there is overlap between the vector and scalar units,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// thereby reducing the overall throughput of vector code wrt. scalar code.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An invalid instruction cost is returned if the type is an MMA vector type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a40003c9aae5f4e1d9cf4b042db0b0c13"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a40003c9aae5f4e1d9cf4b042db0b0c13">PPCTTIImpl::vectorCostAdjustmentFactor</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the vector type is of an MMA type (v256i1, v512i1), an invalid</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction cost is returned. This is to signify to other cost computing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// functions to return the maximum instruction cost in order to prevent any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// opportunities for the optimizer to produce MMA types within the IR.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#ad2093e0d56366af0bbe8387b51f4a4d5">isMMAType</a>(Ty1))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#a57207993e2fe6ec98912e8072e4600bc">InstructionCost::getInvalid</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ST-&gt;vectorsUseTwoUnits() || !Ty1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a>(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT1 = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(Ty1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If type legalization involves splitting the vector, we don&#39;t want to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// double the cost at every step - only the last step.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT1.first != 1 || !LT1.second.isVector())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a>(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> = TLI-&gt;InstructionOpcodeToISD(Opcode);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TLI-&gt;isOperationExpand(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a>, LT1.second))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a>(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ty2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT2 = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(Ty2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT2.first != 1 || !LT2.second.isVector())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a>(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Allow non-throughput costs that aren&#39;t binary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a> != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bba59b32ea7b6f10564abd40ad90602ca5b">TTI::TCK&#95;RecipThroughput</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> == 0 ? 0 : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a228a182df5d1f649d5b9f6dc8be75011"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a228a182df5d1f649d5b9f6dc8be75011">PPCTTIImpl::getCmpSelInstrCost</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ValTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;CondTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> VecPred,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/operandvalueinfo">TTI::OperandValueInfo</a> Op1Info,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a513e1873d7e7760f5e0241cc47a9aaca"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a513e1873d7e7760f5e0241cc47a9aaca">PPCTTIImpl::getVectorInstrCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Val,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Op0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Op1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;This must be a vector type&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> = TLI-&gt;InstructionOpcodeToISD(Opcode);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid opcode&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> CostFactor = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a40003c9aae5f4e1d9cf4b042db0b0c13">vectorCostAdjustmentFactor</a>(Opcode, Val, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CostFactor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#ae01c5ced9fe2fe50f421ae121483ef04">isValid</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#a6de26b938774385a0a4fb0d0b2a32d48">InstructionCost::getMax</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a27bfcb3dd99fa7a7ca8dc24eeac6e8e6">BaseT::getVectorInstrCost</a>(Opcode, Val, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, Op0, Op1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &#42;= CostFactor;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;hasVSX() &amp;&amp; Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a7c742b32ebcd73d6dc851afac295b0f2">getScalarType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#aa0fd6bf3d33236279db7b707bba755f4">isDoubleTy</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Double-precision scalars are already located in index #0 (or #1 if LE).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9329e79f62e9ab9b41cfbcafd314bcbd">ISD::EXTRACT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a> &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">        Index == (ST-&gt;isLittleEndian() ? 1 : 0))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a7c742b32ebcd73d6dc851afac295b0f2">getScalarType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ac6d28a9b11139182134a9618028a0d07">isIntegerTy</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EltSize = Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Computing on 1 bit values requires extra mask or compare operations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaskCostForOneBitSize = (<a href="#a5bc4ce5f29c2ad64b0ff451e5efb3309">VecMaskCost</a> &amp;&amp; EltSize == 1) ? 1 : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Computing on non const index requires extra mask or compare operations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaskCostForIdx = (Index != -1U) ? 0 : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;hasP9Altivec()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// P10 has vxform insert which can handle non const index. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MaskCostForIdx is for masking the index.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// P9 has insert for const index. A move-to VSR and a permute/insert.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Assume vector operation cost for both (cost will be 2x on P9).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad3bc7c2d379fbfdc2f8eaca038690ec9">ISD::INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;hasP10Vector())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CostFactor + MaskCostForIdx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Index != -1U)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 2 &#42; CostFactor;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9329e79f62e9ab9b41cfbcafd314bcbd">ISD::EXTRACT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It&#39;s an extract.  Maybe we can do a cheap move-from VSR.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EltSize = Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// P9 has both mfvsrd and mfvsrld for 64 bit integer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EltSize == 64 &amp;&amp; Index != -1U)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EltSize == 32) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MfvsrwzIndex = ST-&gt;isLittleEndian() ? 2 : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Index == MfvsrwzIndex)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For other indexs like non const, P9 has vxform extract. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MaskCostForIdx is for masking the index.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CostFactor + MaskCostForIdx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need a vector extract (or mfvsrld).  Assume vector operation cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The cost of the load constant for a vector extract is disregarded</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (invariant, easily schedulable).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CostFactor + MaskCostForOneBitSize + MaskCostForIdx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;hasDirectMove() &amp;&amp; Index != -1U) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Assume permute has standard cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Assume move-to/move-from VSR have 2x standard cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad3bc7c2d379fbfdc2f8eaca038690ec9">ISD::INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 3;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 3 + MaskCostForOneBitSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Estimated cost of a load-hit-store delay.  This was obtained</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// experimentally as a minimum needed to prevent unprofitable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vectorization for the paq8p benchmark.  It may need to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// raised further if other unprofitable cases remain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LHSPenalty = 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad3bc7c2d379fbfdc2f8eaca038690ec9">ISD::INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="normal">    LHSPenalty += 7;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Vector element insert/extract with Altivec is very expensive,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// because they require store and reload with the attendant</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// processor stall for load-hit-store.  Until VSX is available,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// these need to be estimated as very costly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9329e79f62e9ab9b41cfbcafd314bcbd">ISD::EXTRACT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a> ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad3bc7c2d379fbfdc2f8eaca038690ec9">ISD::INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LHSPenalty + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CostFactor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#ae01c5ced9fe2fe50f421ae121483ef04">isValid</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TLI-&gt;getValueType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>, Src,  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) == MVT::Other)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a522a29dd7d0932170a6915e84657218b">BaseT::getMemoryOpCost</a>(Opcode, Src, Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Legalize the type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(Src);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Opcode == Instruction::Load || Opcode == Instruction::Store) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid Opcode&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a522a29dd7d0932170a6915e84657218b">BaseT::getMemoryOpCost</a>(Opcode, Src, Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Handle other cost kinds.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a> != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bba59b32ea7b6f10564abd40ad90602ca5b">TTI::TCK&#95;RecipThroughput</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &#42;= CostFactor;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsAltivecType = ST-&gt;hasAltivec() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><Highlight kind="normal">                       (LT.second == MVT::v16i8 || LT.second == MVT::v8i16 ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><Highlight kind="normal">                        LT.second == MVT::v4i32 || LT.second == MVT::v4f32);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsVSXType = ST-&gt;hasVSX() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="normal">                   (LT.second == MVT::v2f64 || LT.second == MVT::v2i64);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// VSX has 32b/64b load instructions. Legalization can handle loading of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 32b/64b to VSR correctly and cheaply. But BaseT::getMemoryOpCost and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PPCTargetLowering can&#39;t compute the cost appropriately. So here we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// explicitly check this case. There are also corresponding store</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MemBits = Src-&gt;getPrimitiveSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SrcBytes = LT.second.getStoreSize();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST-&gt;hasVSX() &amp;&amp; IsAltivecType) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MemBits == 64 || (ST-&gt;hasP8Vector() &amp;&amp; MemBits == 32))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use lfiwax/xxspltw</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> AlignBytes = Alignment ? &#42;Alignment : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::Load &amp;&amp; MemBits == 32 &amp;&amp; AlignBytes &lt; SrcBytes)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Aligned loads and stores are easy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!SrcBytes || !Alignment || &#42;Alignment &gt;= SrcBytes)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we can use the permutation-based load sequence, then this is also</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// relatively cheap (not counting loop-invariant instructions): one load plus</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// one permute (the last load in a series has extra cost, but we&#39;re</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// neglecting that here). Note that on the P7, we could do unaligned loads</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for Altivec types using the VSX instructions, but that&#39;s more expensive</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// than using the permutation-based load sequence. On the P8, that&#39;s no</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// longer true.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::Load &amp;&amp; (!ST-&gt;hasP8Vector() &amp;&amp; IsAltivecType) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#42;Alignment &gt;= LT.second.getScalarType().getStoreSize())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> + LT.first; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add the cost of the permutations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For VSX, we can do unaligned loads and stores on Altivec/VSX types. On the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// P7, unaligned vector loads are more expensive than the permutation-based</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// load sequence, so that might be used instead, but regardless, the net cost</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is about the same (not counting loop-invariant instructions).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsVSXType || (ST-&gt;hasVSX() &amp;&amp; IsAltivecType))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Newer PPC supports unaligned memory access.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TLI-&gt;allowsMisalignedMemoryAccesses(LT.second, 0))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PPC in general does not support unaligned loads and stores. They&#39;ll need</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to be decomposed based on the alignment factor.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add the cost of each scalar load or store.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Alignment);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += LT.first &#42; ((SrcBytes / Alignment-&gt;value()) - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For a vector type, there is also scalarization overhead (only for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stores, loads are expanded using the vector-load + permutation sequence,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which is much less expensive).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Src-&gt;isVectorTy() &amp;&amp; Opcode == Instruction::Store)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Src)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-cpp/#a2f1d58ac35de4475017aca6c5bda6d44">getNumElements</a>(); i &lt; e;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><Highlight kind="normal">         ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a513e1873d7e7760f5e0241cc47a9aaca">getVectorInstrCost</a>(Instruction::ExtractElement, Src, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, i,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#afffe3207f30907d3ca4800ba3d26c9f0"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#afffe3207f30907d3ca4800ba3d26c9f0">PPCTTIImpl::getInterleavedMemoryOpCost</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;VecTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Factor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> Indices,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a706f223f760b55668fbae74202b816bb">TTI::TargetCostKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseMaskForCond, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseMaskForGaps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> CostFactor =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a40003c9aae5f4e1d9cf4b042db0b0c13">vectorCostAdjustmentFactor</a>(Opcode, VecTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CostFactor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#ae01c5ced9fe2fe50f421ae121483ef04">isValid</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost/#a6de26b938774385a0a4fb0d0b2a32d48">InstructionCost::getMax</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// On P9 but not on P10, if the op is misaligned then it will cause a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pipeline flush. Otherwise the VSX masked memops cost the same as unmasked</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ones.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> DesiredAlignment(16);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Alignment &gt;= DesiredAlignment || ST-&gt;getCPUDirective() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#afabcc2ff4ea75ff845f97b0807e8de34a0a03bfd83c00f4d1edab975b7bfe7f36">PPC::DIR&#95;PWR9</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since alignment may be under estimated, we try to compute the probability</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that the actual address is aligned to the desired boundary. For example</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an 8-byte aligned load is assumed to be actually 16-byte aligned half the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// time, while a 4-byte aligned load has a 25% chance of being 16-byte</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// aligned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">float</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AlignmentProb = ((float)Alignment.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>()) / DesiredAlignment.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">float</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MisalignmentProb = 1 - AlignmentProb;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MisalignmentProb &#42; P9PipelineFlushEstimate) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><Highlight kind="normal">           (AlignmentProb &#42; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>.getValue());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Usually we should not get to this point, but the following is an attempt to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// model the cost of legalization. Currently we can only lower intrinsics with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// evl but no mask, on Power 9/10. Otherwise, we must scalarize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a172b3291a66a7313017f3d68422da9cd">getMaskedMemoryOpCost</a>(Opcode, Src, Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a507c08cbe76f2b19fc1a62d7e02343ea"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcttiimpl/#a507c08cbe76f2b19fc1a62d7e02343ea">PPCTTIImpl::supportsTailCallFor</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42;CB)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TLI-&gt;supportsTailCallFor(CB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
